text: I really want to work for the BA and it makes me feeling good that there is an high requirement for aircraft engineers.

Apologies for being off line for a bit. Working from home this week though. I will send thoughts on your CV tomorrow. Worth thinking though about how you demonstrate your skills e.g. determination. A good thing to do is to create a workbook in excel. Name each of the tabs a skill and then provide examples of how you demonstrated the skill in specific situations.
